text: Method name [Description his method is called when the user touches or focuses on the item using navigation- onClick() keys or trackball or presses on the "enter" key or presses down on the trackball. his method is called when the user touches and holds the item or focuses on the item using navigation-keys or trackball and presses and holds "enter" key or presses and onLongClick() holds down on the trackball (for one second). his method is called when the user navigates onto or away from the item, using the onFocusChange() navigation-keys or trackball. his method is called when the user is focused on the item and presses or releases a 0 hardware key on the device. his method is called when the user performs a touch event, including a press, a onTouch() release, or any movement gesture on the screen. onCreateContextMe nu() his method is called when a Context Menu is being built. c
